about.title: About me
about.description: I'm an 18 year old programmer who has found love in programming. I've been experimenting with technology from a young age. Currently I like to make projects with a variety of programming languages.
about.hobbies: Apart from programming, I like to play the guitar & listen to music. I'm a scuba diver & ex-competitive swimmer.

programming.title: Programming
programming.description: I've been programming for 3 years. I've been experimenting with a wide range of programming languages.

photography.title: Photography
photography.description: I'm an amateur photographer who likes to take photographs of nature and urban scenes. I use a professional camera to take high quality photos. I prefer cameras above phone cameras because the quality is just so much better.

tools.title: My computer setup
tools.description: I'm a casual Linux user. I like to "rice" my computer to look nice but still be very productive. I frequently update public dot files on GitHub. As my programming IDE, I use Visual Studio Code.
